title: Australian Film Television & Radio School 1998 showreel
abstract: The Laundry (dir. Alex Chomicz, 6 min.)--Relative strangers (dir. Rosemary Hesp, 11 min.)--Tears (dir. Ivan Sen, 16 min.)--Serving suggestion (dir. Tony Thorne, 3 min.)--Great falls (dir. Yves Stening, 22 min.)--Behind the mask (dir. Kim Farrant, 18 min.)--My bed your bed (dir. Erica Glynn, 17 min.)--Has beans (dir. Andy Tamandl, 9 min.)--Jess' homecoming (dir. Philip Joseph, 9 min.)--Alias (dir. Kim Farrant, 11 min.)--Domesticated animals (dir. Adam Blaiklock, 9 min.)--Zipper: great moments in art & fashion (dir. Antoinette Starkiewicz, 6 min.)--The Spy who liked me (dir. Chris Aronston, 14 min.)--Cherish (dir. Stephen Jones, 7 min.)--Half mongrel (dir. Alex Chomicz, 13 min.)--My familiar (dir. James Shadbolt, 13 min.)--The White tree (dir. Paolo Bassi, 22 min.)--The Naked lady vanishes (dir. Ian Walker, 27 min.)
